title: Watch Face Sunny
summary: Watch Face Sunny Sunrise & SunsetMoon Phasing & Altimeter
description: Android Wear Watch Face SUNNYTells you when the sun rises! It also includes the sunset as well as moonrise and phasing on your watch face. Looks like a premium Suunto or Breitling watch. Modern design for outdoor usage - luxury outdoor fun watch - the best watch on the app store for hiking. Awesome Animations like on a Omega watch! Round or Rectangle the Watch supports both.function+ Big Date & Time+ Sunset & Sunrise+ Moonset & Moonrise & Phasing (Full Moon, Half, Eclipse, ...)+ Altimeter, tells you how high you are ;-)- Weather is not supported yet (we are working on it)customization+ Save battery with the ambient brightness option!+ Show / Hide Datecompatible devices:Moto360, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear, ASUS ZenWatch, ...This App works with any smartwatch that runs Android Wear!install:After installing the app on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the watchLong press on the watch face clock, then select SUNNY or use the companion app.Suggestions to improve the watch? Let us know by contacting us and we'll do our best.*designed in switzerland - swiss made*
descriptionHTML:
Android Wear Watch Face SUNNY
Tells you when the sun rises! It also includes the sunset as well as moonrise and phasing on your watch face. Looks like a premium Suunto or Breitling watch. Modern design for outdoor usage - luxury outdoor fun watch - the best watch on the app store for hiking. Awesome Animations like on a Omega watch! Round or Rectangle the Watch supports both.

function
+ Big Date & Time
+ Sunset & Sunrise
+ Moonset & Moonrise & Phasing (Full Moon, Half, Eclipse, ...)
+ Altimeter, tells you how high you are ;-)
- Weather is not supported yet (we are working on it)

customization
+ Save battery with the ambient brightness option!
+ Show / Hide Date

compatible devices:
Moto360, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear, ASUS ZenWatch, ...
This App works with any smartwatch that runs Android Wear!

install:
After installing the app on your phone, the app automatically installs itself on the watch
Long press on the watch face clock, then select SUNNY or use the companion app.

Suggestions to improve the watch? Let us know by contacting us and we'll do our best.
*designed in switzerland - swiss made*
comments: smartwatch 3 sony Hi i just bought you app. for the altimeter. but the altimeter stays on 0 meter... what you i do do get it working?  otherwise i bought it for nothing.  kind regards Kevin
Cool apps This app is great,please keep developing it, I'm using the Sony smart3,yes altimeter is zero,but it's not why I bought this app .
12 hr option Im not used to 24 hr clock, but nice face
Thickness option and color? Sunrise and sunset are not showing up.  Altimeter only doors 0.  Can we get these options on this face?
Amazing Love the simplistic beauty of this watchface its stunning animations are very smooth and minimalisticly intricate!!! Good job devs
Altimeter is not working, it always displays 0. Location settings are enabled. Could you assist?
